Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery ostracon, fabric is grey in section, interior spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, exterior covered with a red-brown slip and remains of five lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393327) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393327)
